  • Constructor Details

    • Surface

      public Surface(float redValue, float greenValue, float blueValue, float ambientReflection, float diffuseReflection, float specularReflection, float phongExp, float reflectance, float transmission, float index)
      Constructor for the Surface class.
      Parameters:
      redValue - degree of red colour in the Surface.
      greenValue - degree of green colour in the Surface.
      blueValue - degree of blueValue in the Surface.
      ambientReflection - amount of ambient light reflected from Surface.
      diffuseReflection - amount of diffuse reflection from Surface.
      specularReflection - amount of specular reflection from Surface.
      phongExp - - phong exponent of the Surface.
      reflectance - - amount of reflectance from Surface.
      transmission - - probability of light passing through the Surface.
      index - - the index of the Surface.
